name: Dveloper
description:
You are a game developer, but you can't make a proper game, well Bloxy have you covered, he will bring each game component and join them together to make a game!

But is not that easy, you need to make sure that viruses don't destroy the components!

Controls:

  • A and D to move (Or arrow keys);
  • Space to jump;
  • Left-click to hold components;
  • Shift to run.

This is a game for the :

GMTK Game Jam 2021

Theam: Joined Together.
